theory.brief: Unit 4 học về việc nhớ về quá khứ với 2 chủ điểm ngữ pháp: (1) Thì quá khứ tiếp diễn (Past Continuous) dùng để diễn tả hành động đang xảy ra tại một thời điểm trong quá khứ, và (2) Câu ước với Wish + past simple để diễn tả mong ước về điều không có thật ở hiện tại hoặc khó thực hiện được.
examples: I was visiting Hoi An when I met my old friend. (Tôi đang thăm Hội An khi tôi gặp bạn cũ.)
While she was sleeping, someone knocked on the door. (Khi cô ấy đang ngủ, có người gõ cửa.)
I wish I had more time to travel. (Tôi ước mình có nhiều thời gian hơn để đi du lịch.)
She wishes she could visit the ancient castle. (Cô ấy ước mình có thể thăm lâu đài cổ.)

exercises.question: My dad first met my mum when he __________ Hoi An Ancient Town.
exercises.explanation: Past continuous: was/were + V-ing (hành động đang xảy ra trong quá khứ)

exercises.question: Tom had a nightmare while he __________ in the camp.
exercises.explanation: While + past continuous (hành động đang diễn ra)

exercises.question: David hurt his foot while he __________ down the steps of the pagoda.
exercises.explanation: Past continuous với 'while' (đang làm gì thì có sự việc khác xảy ra)

exercises.question: __________ you watching TV at 9 p.m. last night?
exercises.explanation: Câu hỏi past continuous: Were + you + V-ing?

exercises.question: People __________ the monument for years because it had great value.
exercises.explanation: Past continuous với 'people' (số nhiều): were + V-ing

exercises.question: When I finished school, my family __________ in the countryside.
exercises.explanation: Past continuous: family (số ít) → was + V-ing

exercises.question: I wish I __________ more presents every Christmas.
exercises.explanation: Wish + past simple (mong ước không có thật ở hiện tại)

exercises.question: I wish I __________ enough money to visit London.
exercises.explanation: Wish + past simple để diễn tả mong ước về hiện tại

exercises.question: Do you wish we __________ a swimming pool in our school?
exercises.explanation: Wish + past simple

exercises.question: We wish we __________ spend our summer holiday on the seaside.
exercises.explanation: Wish + could (quá khứ của can) để diễn tả mong ước

exercises.question: I wish I __________ go back to my grandparents' time.
exercises.explanation: Wish + could để diễn tả mong ước về khả năng

exercises.question: I __________ a presentation when the microphone stopped working.
exercises.explanation: Past continuous (đang làm gì thì có sự việc khác xảy ra)

exercises.question: __________ you still working on the farm when the war broke out?
exercises.explanation: Past continuous question: Were + you + V-ing?

exercises.question: People __________ the Taj Mahal while Shah Jahan was emperor.
exercises.explanation: Past continuous với 'while' (hai hành động song song)

exercises.question: She wishes she __________ her own room.
exercises.explanation: Wish + past simple

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: I was visiting Hoi An when I met my friend
acceptedAnswers: I was visiting Hoi An when I met my friend
I was visiting Hoi An when I met my friend.

acceptedAnswers: While he was sleeping someone knocked on the door
While he was sleeping, someone knocked on the door
While he was sleeping someone knocked on the door.
While he was sleeping, someone knocked on the door.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: I wish I had more time to travel
acceptedAnswers: I wish I had more time to travel
I wish I had more time to travel.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: We wish we could spend our holiday by the sea
acceptedAnswers: We wish we could spend our holiday by the sea
We wish we could spend our holiday by the sea.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: People were preserving the monument for many years
acceptedAnswers: People were preserving the monument for many years
People were preserving the monument for many years.

exercises.question: My brother __________ just sitting while I was looking around.
exercises.explanation: Past continuous: my brother (số ít) → was + V-ing

exercises.question: I wish I __________ clean my room every day.
exercises.explanation: Wish + didn't have to (mong ước không phải làm gì)

exercises.question: She wishes her sister __________ put dirty clothes on her bed.
exercises.explanation: Wish + past simple (phủ định)

exercises.question: What __________ you doing at 8 p.m. yesterday?
exercises.explanation: Past continuous question: What + were + you + doing?

exercises.question: The children __________ in the yard when it started to rain.
exercises.explanation: Past continuous (đang chơi thì trời mưa)

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: She wishes she could visit the ancient castle
acceptedAnswers: She wishes she could visit the ancient castle
She wishes she could visit the ancient castle.

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: They were building the bridge when the storm came
acceptedAnswers: They were building the bridge when the storm came
They were building the bridge when the storm came.

exercises.question: I wish the weather __________ better today.
exercises.explanation: Wish + were (dùng 'were' cho tất cả ngôi trong câu ước)
hints: Câu ước dùng 'were' cho mọi chủ ngữ

exercises.question: He __________ along the street when he saw the accident.
exercises.explanation: Past continuous (đang đi thì thấy tai nạn)

exercises.question: I wish I __________ speak French fluently.
exercises.explanation: Wish + could (mong ước có khả năng)
